items.sentence: I wish I could express myself better in French.
I wish I could play tennis as well as Tom does.
I wish I could speak French as fluently as you.
I wish I could still swim as well as I used to.
Whenever Tom comes to Boston, he stays with us.
Where do you go when you need time to yourself?
Where do you think Tom is going to be tomorrow?
Where was Tom going and why was he going there?
I\'ll take care of your dog while you\'re away.
I\'m afraid I won\'t finish the report on time.
I hope Tom enjoys singing as much as Mary does.
I hope that Tom likes the cake I baked for him.
I need to get out of the house for a few hours.
Tom had his chauffeur drive him to the theater.
Tom had no chance to tell Mary what he thought.
Tom had no idea that Mary was going to be here.
Tom had no intention of ever seeing Mary again.
Tom had a little trouble finding Mary\'s house.
It looked like Tom had a lot on his mind today.
It looks as though Tom is waiting for somebody.
